title: Dick Little
text:
Richard Little was an English professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="right%20back">right back</a> who played in the <a href="Scottish%20Football%20League">Scottish League</a> for <a href="Motherwell%20F.C.">Motherwell</a>, <a href="Hamilton%20Academical%20F.C.">Hamilton Academical</a>, <a href="Dunfermline%20Athletic%20F.C.">Dunfermline Athletic</a>, <a href="Cowdenbeath%20F.C.">Cowdenbeath</a> and <a href="Morton%20F.C.">Morton</a>.
Personal life.
Little served as an <a href="able%20seaman">able seaman</a> in the <a href="Royal%20Navy">Royal Navy</a> during the <a href="First%20World%20War">First World War</a> and saw action at the <a href="Battle%20of%20Jutland">Battle of Jutland</a>. After retiring from football, he became a <a href="greenskeeper">greenskeeper</a> at <a href="Bothwell%20Castle">Bothwell Castle</a> Golf Club.
Honours.
Hamilton Academical
